content.detailedDescription:
On tuesday, june 14, 2011, my wife and i were at aria resort & casino in las vegas on the 2nd day of our 5 day vacation. when in vegas, our routine is to get to the pool at or around the time they open, which is typically 9:00 am. that day we arrived at the pool, picked our spots, and were in the pool by 9:30. at this time, half of las vegas is still asleep, so there were no more than 20 people at this pool at this time. 

weather conditions: hot (probably high 80���s already, i believe it got up to 103 later that day); not a single cloud in the sky. no wind.

 shortly after dipping in the pool, i noticed a large, unusually shaped white luminous come from over the mountain range to the west/northwest of the las vegas strip (i believe the spring mountain range?). there is not one thing i can think of to describe the shape, except that it was a cluster of some sorts, with a rod coming down from it. my initial skeptical reaction was that it was balloons, but: at that distance, and it���s size, it could not be balloons, and at that point is was easy enough to see detail that it definitely was not balloons. plus it emitted a bright, glowing light. i was pointing it out to my wife, and other people around us began to notice and talk about it as well. the object got higher in the sky, then started moving south along the mountain range (towards the flight path of mccarren airport). then, another object came over the range. this object, was smaller, and appeared to be a single oval shape. it was the same white color, and also emitted the same bright white light. 

over the next hour or so, we watched the objects as they moved to the south/southwest. they were definitely moving in tandem, and sometimes swap positions (left/right), but they always were fairly far apart. it was around 11:00 am when i saw the two lights for the last time. they were quite faint, far & at a high altitude. one was straight to the south, and one was southwest ��� they were very far apart at this point. 

here are some other notes:

-	right after the second object came into view, the area they were would have been directly in the flight path for departures/arrivals at mccarren airport. i noticed that during that time period, no planes took off or landed from that direction.
-	if possible, can you attain air traffic control recording, chatter from that day? whatever the objects were, they had to have been talking about it ��� because the control tower would have had clear view of the objects the whole time.
-	also, there were approximately 10 helicopters the roared overhead (lv strip/grand canyon tours) during the time period where the sighting took place. pilots & tourists had to have seen it.
-	reason for waiting to report after a month: i thought for sure someone else, perhaps an aviation professional would have made a report by now. i���ve been checking this site and others like it daily since this sighting happened hoping to see something but to no avail. i am still disturbed at how blatant these craft were above a major city, one of the busiest airports in the us, and the fact that they came from the general direction of area 51 & the nevada test site.
-	i���d be happy to answer any questions an investigator may have.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Long duration daylight sighting of 2 craft from las vegas strip

content.detailedDescription:
Watching the fireworks on the beach.  6 or 7 orbs traveled in formation from offshore in the nw traveling to the e past the fireworks we were watching.

hundreds of people witnessed them.  they flew out over the atlantic ocean and slowly disappeared. could of been chinese lanterns i guess.  definitely were not planes.  it seems as if there are a lot of reports of orange orbs on july 4, 2011.
content.summary: Orange orbs

content.detailedDescription:
My mother (name deleted)fg and i were sitting on our front porch having a cigarette, and talking. i was sitting on the bottom step, and mom was sitting on a chair, farther up on the portch, about a foot away from me and about two feet higher in visual perspective. mom brought my attention to an object in the western sky, low. 

we both watch the skies regularly, due to previous small sightings. 

i don't know what made her notice it- she's not sure either. she said that she thinks it was because it /wasn't/ blinking. it was a steady light. it was a red orb or sphere. it seemed self-luminos; similar to a red, old-fashioned christmas bulb (one of the big ones they used to make,) only spherical. 

i watched to see if it would turn. we see lots of airplanes here, and sometimes you can't tell what they are until they turn, and you see the headlights. the object i saw turned enough to make sure it wasn't an airplane. it had no headlights, like an airplane. it was also not a helicopter. we have even more experience with those where i live- our house is directly under the main flight path for medi-flight helicopters from a local hospital (sacred heart hospital) and since we are in a poor and a slightly-higher crime neighborhood, we see many police helicopters (every friday and saturday night, in fact. we've started joking about it.) 

the object i saw made no noise, certainly not the noise of a plane or helicopter. it could not have been a high-flying plane- the light was too big and appeared to be closer to the ground than that. i would estimate it was about as far up as the helicopters i frequently see. but it was not a helicopter. 

we watched it move, with no sound, toward and north of us. from my point of view, it seemed to... wiggle (is the best word i can think of) slowly back and forth as it flew. my mother states that she didn't observe the wiggling, but she had a slightly harder time seeing it than myself, from her position on the portch. the light was steady, still red, and moved smoothy... even the wiggles were smooth and slow.

i kept my eyes open, purposely not blinking, and watched it begin to flicker from red to orange to white and back again before it simply disappeared. (i've had sightings before where i found blinking to be a problem in tracking the ufo, so now, i just try not to blink!);) literally, one second it was there and the next it was gone. there was no streak of light or any kind of trail. we watched the sky for a while after, seeing if it would appear again, but it didn't. 

a neighbor, across the street came bursting out his front door with his dog, looked up at the sky, and ran back inside. i'm pretty sure he saw the light from the back of his house, and came out front when he lost it. no one takes their dog out for a 3 second walk. if i talk to him tomorrow i will urge him to make his own report.

as far as how i (and my mother) felt, i can only say that it was the same as our previous sightings. that is to say that we both had the feeling of it noticing that we noticed it. this time, it seemed like our seeing it made it flee, like it didn't want to be seen. this frustrates me, though, because i've seen "lights" through the course of my life. now, i want to see a whole ship! i guess i kinda feel like, if i don't see the outline of a ship, i can't be absolutely certain of what i saw. i know there are probably a million explanations for what i saw tonight that i haven't already thought of, but it was weird. and after hearing of other people's sightings, i feel kinda cheated that all i get to see are lights! that's how i feel, anyway. my mom described the whole thing as "high strangeness."
content.summary: Red spherical object in night sky

content.detailedDescription:
I'm an army brat. i was living in north ft lewis, washington state in a community called beachwood. a couple weeks after mt st helen erupted i was fishing on a small pond called sears lake. it's located about one block just off american lake and set deep in ravine/crater like area.My buddy stephen o'briant and myself were fishing for trout. suddenly what appeared above us was this enormous perfectly, disc shaped object. i would describe it's color as brushed silver. it hovered about 10-20 seconds while moving ever so slightly, before it shot off towards mt rainier. we couldn't believe our eyes and were thankful to have each other for witnesses. it was so close above the tree line that i literally looked for "usaf" on it, but found nothing. 
within the next couple of weeks i went back there with another friend, peter miranda. we had been followed by a group of local gal friends we hung out with. while peter flirted with atop a sharp hill behind me it appeared again. hung around for about the same length of time and shot off again, but this time in a more southeastern direction as opposed to the east/southeastern direction it went during the first encounter.
i will never forget this event.

jes c
content.summary: Silver saucer shaped object hovers just above the tree's in ft.Lewis washington after mt. st. helen erupts

content.detailedDescription:
I know for a fact that alien life forms are here with us. and is in our government and are in control of our political world. you people need to understand that they are here for and our government has no idea what the h*** to think about it, other than their hands are tied. my pictures convinced me. it's all a wait and see game.

on march 19th , 2011 ,, the moon was close to earth, the closest it will be in years to come. so,,i decided to take some pictures. uhhh ohhh ,,why are their silver objects around our moon. also,,, green objects,,blue objects,,i know a star when i see one,, and these are not stars in my photos.

i zoomed into the pictures on my computer ,, and i know these are craft of some kind. not from here,,,unless we already have this fabulous tech. which i'm sure we do, thanks to our alien contacts.

these photos of the moon i took are a bit blurry ( as far as the moon ) but,,,ooops ,, the crafts and colors come in quite well.

thanks
content.summary: March 19th ,, moon closest to earth

content.detailedDescription: I was outside looking at the stars at 1130. i noticed several small aircraft in the area. they had the usual stobe lights an the were all flying under the clouds. i spotted a solid white light light traveling sw to ne. it had no flashing lights. it appeared to be the same size as the aircraft in the area, but it was moving very fast. it was also much higher than the aircraft. it eventually passed out of sight above the clouds. it was not a meteor. there was no tail. i don't think it was a satellite because the ones i've seen are kind of tumbling and reflecting light. there was no aircraft from nas whidbey flying either.
content.summary: Solid light traveling fast and high over nas whidbey

content.detailedDescription: I saw the very same thing that the person from pa. reported to have seen on july 14, 2011. it was very bright, low flying , and did not make a sound at all. i sure would like to know what it was that i saw that evening. all i know is what ever i saw was something not of this world and it was real. i saw this in west texas.
content.summary: Bright orange and oval shape orb.

content.detailedDescription: Was walking my dog at 9:30pm  looking up at the stars as i normally do.  dog was done with  business  started walking to front of house  when i noticed a bright star @ 9:45 pm that i though was moving and it was  i ran in house put dog upin less then 15 seconds  and grabbed my 15x70 astronomy binoculars  by the door and watched it speed by it did not blink  looked like a satellite  but lower and moved a lot faster then the ones iv seen in past  lostsight of it when trees on hill blocked view. saw about 2-3 mins of it.
content.summary: Bright starlike  object moving at a very fast speed  east to west

content.detailedDescription: At 10:30pm on july 16, 2011 my husband and i were outside in our pool in the backyard.  i looked up and noticed three brilliant fiery orange orbs in the sky above the tree line and rooftops.  the three orbs were in a straight line and moving from southeast to northwest across the sky.  i yelled to my husband to come look at what i was seeing.  as he got over to my vantage point, four more orbs followed the orignal three in a straight line.  then two more appeared in the line.  as each of the orbs reached the same point in the sky the orange light dimmed (as if the orb moved straight up/further away from us and out of sight distance.)  when the last of the initial 9 orbs disappeared, another four appeared in the same origination point in the sky.  however, they were not in a straight line across the horizon.  they were in a scrambled pattern.  three of them followed the same route as the first 9 and the last disipated into the sky before the point where the others vanished.  none of the orbs made a single sound and none of them left a tail/trail through the sky.  we often have planes and ems helicopters fly over our house.  we are 100% sure that these orbs were not planes or helicopters.  we tried to catch them on film but did not have any luck.  all we ended up with is an audio recording of the last four orbs that we witnessed.
content.summary: 9 brilliant fiery orbs float across the sky followed by 4 more

content.detailedDescription:
Around 6 to 7 p.M. on june 20, 2011,  i was taking photos of the pretty cloud formations on the deck of my cousin's home.  suddenly, i became aware of an object flying from west to east in front of me, about a mile or so away.  it was above tree level. the bottom of the left side of the object seemed to be reflecting light, (which made me notice it). i thought the reflection was from sunlight, but the top part didn't seem to have the same reflection. my first thought was that the object was a plane, but the front right end of it was round, so i was unsure of what i was seeing.  my far vision isn't as clear as my close up sight.  i took a photo with my canon digital camera, and continued to watch it fly to the east until it was out of sight.

it never occurred to me that i might be seeing a ufo. even though i have watched many ufo programs, my mind set was not on that thought, or i would have taken many photos. rather, i was simply taking photos of the clouds for the purpose of doing a painting, since i am an artist.
the object did not change its direction or move up, down or diagonally.  it just flew straight across the sky, horizontally, till out of sight.  it flew at the normal rate of speed of one of our airplanes. i did not see any additional lights flashing or reflecting, once i had taken the photo.  it showed no reflection as it flew east, away from me. 

it was only when i finally had time to look at my photos from my trip, that i came across the picture i had taken and was shocked at what i saw. when i had first seen the object it, there were lighter clouds behind it, which made it more difficult to be seen. in my photo, by the time i had raised my camera to take the picture, the object had moved to an area with a darker cloud behind it, so it could be seen well. from what i recall, as the object continued to move east, the sky behind it was a light shade of blue; i did not see its total shape at all.  i don't know whether the object moved somewhat higher or lower to make that occur, or whether the clouds shifted.

as i went back into the house, i felt uncomfortable. i think i realized that i had seen something that was unusual and didn't know how to process that thought. no one was in the room for a while when i entered it, so i didn't discuss the incident, and just forgot about it.
content.summary: While taking photos of clouds, i noticed an object flying across sky.  the back end glistened, and the front looked round.

content.detailedDescription: On friday july 15th, at 9;40pm, i was using the south highway access onto i-675 at exit two heading for exit 38 on i-75 south, and out ahead of me i spotted a rather large craft with red lights on each corner, which i believe were actually on the botton and it was turning to the right and when it leveled off, all you could see was a thin red line of light that encased the shape of the vehicle, which belive was triangular. i lost sight of it for about 15 seconds as i was on the exit ramp for i-75 south and trees in the landscaped blocked my view, until i got to the top of the rise, past the trees, and there it was again, farther south than just a few seconds ago, and it was headed west or to my right and i could see a white light in the center. as i was getting close to exit 38, i looked through my passenger window and saw a very bright white light, that didn't appear to be moving i'd guess it was about 3500' in the air and the light itself was shining down at about a 45 degree angle like a beam, toward the highway. as i was coming down the exit ramp at exit 38, as soon as i stopped at the bottom of the hill, behind a large dump truck, i exited my car and looked toward the area where i saw the light, just seconds before and this light shot from west to east in a flash, and was gone.
content.summary: Triangular shaped object with red lights on the corners

content.detailedDescription: Don't know if it was an ufo or anything, but seemed slower with no streak. as it passed me it came across the highway, and i got out my cell phone and took a pictue. a lot of traffic was coming from the other way. i would think someone else would have seen it. the place was ron regan, coming off i-275. i can not confirm what it was. i thought you might like to look at the picture.
content.summary: Thought it was a shooting star

content.detailedDescription: 3 children&i were playing hide & seek when i noticed lights shooting from one star to another,we watched for 20 mins in amasement.Lights were all over the night sky doing odd things that were so far away.I had to tell my mom who was in the house and so did the kids from next store. my mom was resting and when i told her what i was seeing she just told me to go away i am resting.It took 15 mins of pleating with her befor she got up and came outside.Now when everyone was outside nieghbors included,ipointed in the direction of the strange lights but nothing was happening.As we looked around the sky we saw nothing.All i remember is all of us looked back were i frist saw the shooting lights and every thing went black our front porch lights the street light,when i turned around i saw a huge disk shaped object 6 or 7 storys high and as big as a football feild with no noise.It had different colored lights in the middle changing every few seconds....This thing came out of nowhere because i just looked in that direction no less than 1/2 second ago!...As we watched the ufo in darkness it slowly followed the hwy rt 62 in northcollins ny.Go along the road at the same speed about 5 mph.Soon it went over tall trees a1/2 mile away and it was gone.Soon after the street light came on and did our front lights.   my mother went in the house and called the police.It took the police about 45 mins to arrive and take statements.Now as we are all there we see from the southwest 3 bright lightscomming at us fast with a lot of noise. as it got closer it flew directly over our heads it was so low,as low as the ufo we saw earlier, on the bottom of the aircraft were the letters u s a f in black lettering. the cop and the rest of us dident know what to make of it.I have told this story to my friends who say ya ok what were you smoking i was a 13 yr old country boy at the time for gods sake.  some of the wittness are no longer with us but there are 4 or 5 still out there and saw exactly what i told you. iam not making this up,i have been waiting years to tell my story to a credible organization    all i can say is this was not from this world,and feel honored to see something that big float above my head  god bless yours truly stephen rice.
content.summary: Playing hide& seek with children next store,i noticed a light shoot from one star to another.So we all stoped and watched this strange event!

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my boxer for the last time before i went to bed. while we were on the floodwall that runs adjacent to harrison avenue in old clarksville, i notice an orange orb moving in an irregular pattern aproximately a half mile to three quarter mile north of my position. so i decided to watch it for a moment to see if it would burst like a fire work explosion, or fall and fade out like a flare, or just blink out. it didn't do any of those things. it moved oddly to the east, and then started on an upward angle toward the sky and dissapeared. when i got home i immediately told my wife what i'd seen, and my eyes started watering uncontrollably for about thirty seconds. i believe that to be due to the fact that whatever i'd seen wasn't a normal occurance and my mind was having diffuclty accepting the event. it will be the last time i ever leave my house at night with out my cell!
content.summary: Orange orb in sky

content.detailedDescription:
I have a profile on facebook that connects over 3000 people from around the world in regards to ufo information, virginia beach ufo quest.
this profile mainly talks about ancient aliens, other theories, past and current sightings from around the world.
everyone is welcome to share information and i generally check out the photos and videos.
this one man in particular had several videos and pictures that he thought were something unique of the sun, in particular.
so on july 16, 2011 around 1:15 pm, i went outside in our yard to take my own pictures of the sun. i shot some video and took a few pictures consecutively, but on different settings, within 30 seconds of each other or less.
i then uploaded the pictures and video into my camera. the majority of what i got was the same as the man's in question... light reflections from my camera lens around the sun in pentagon and hexagon shapes, various colors, beautiful but nothing unusual. 
after taking a second look at my own pictures, i noticed something out of the normal, something to the middle left of the sun. it was (compared to the sun) small, but in reality was the size of our moon at least, maybe the size of the earth. it was gray, round very noticeable. 
i then went back into my camera, cropped the photo as much as possible to give me a closer image and then uploaded them. the reflections in the first set of pictures were very distinguishable and had no mass, however the "ufo" in question had solid mass.
i fully understand the term "ufo" unidentified flying object. this could be anything from a craft to a planet... it is unknown, but something.
content.summary: While taking pictures of the sun, i captured the ufo

content.detailedDescription:
On july 14, 2011 at 10:00 pm i was in bed when i heard next door neighbor yelling to her father about something in the sky was on fire.  very serious tone in her voice.  i got up and went to the back guest room window, looked out but did not see anything.  i could hear the neighbor saying to her father , to the right, look to the right.  i then looked to the right still did not see anything.
 
kept looking and then saw a large orange oval/orb like object moving from east to west comming towards my position.  i could see it through the tree branches, and it eventually was able to be seen in full view.  the object was large orange oval/orb like in structure.  the color was extreamly bright/vibrant.  the object moved very slowly, no sound could be heard.  i estimate it was about as high as a hillicopter would fly, but lower than commercial planes would fly. i remember planes flying at a higher altitude.  

the object moved in a northwesterly direction, then stopped.  it then reversed direction, and hovered for a few seconds and then headed northward in a slow manner.  my vision was then obscurred by the trees.I went to get my wife to have her see it as well, but when we both got back, the object was no longer there.

i have never seen anything like this before, it manuvered unlike any conventional craft i have seen.  it was not a hot air baloon or any home made prank, it was real.  as i viewed the object, i kept thinking this is strange very unusual, i was a little firghtened, but needed to view the object as i probably not see anything like this for the rest of my life.  my wife said when i came into the room to get her, that i was all keyed up/emotional.  she knew i had seen something strange.  

thinking back after the sighting, i believe what i saw was a ufo.  i'm glad i had the opportunity to witness this object.  i'm suprised ther have been no reports or mention of this occurrance.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright orange orb like object was viewed in the sky, no noise, hovered, changed direction then moved on

content.detailedDescription: i was setting on my patio at around 4 30 july 17  there appeared a flash like a lighting bolt in the sky just a few yards away from me. it was a neon green color and it came from the sky down to the earth. it was really weird and set my nerves on edge. my friend who was coming out onto the patio said he saw it out of the corner of his eye. he explained it as a lighting bolt. the sky was clear and the sun was not up as of yet. it was gone as fast as it appeared. i am not normally up this early but was having my coffee before we had to leave to take my friend to the air port.
content.summary: Green streak in sky

content.detailedDescription:
I got home from work, then noticed this orange light which seemed to be at low altitude, because it was cloudy out but the light seemed to be below the clouds. it was moving rather slowly. i took a video of it. at the very beginning of the video you will see the full moon with some clouds in front of it, which gives you a reference to how bright this unknown light was. it didnt make any noise. you can hear several cars drive past. the light began to fade shortly after i started filming it, but i got about a minute of it on film.

earlier in the day i noticed a similar light in approxiamately the same area. it wasn't dark out then, but i didn't take a video of it the first time.
content.summary: Bright orangish light moving w to e, below clouds, faded out over 1 minute.

content.detailedDescription: Large spinning round ufo craft seen in tustin california near jamboree and the 5 freeway on 7/16/11. my wife, i, and numerous witnesses coming out of a store observed the craft descending with "white" lights all around it's circular shape.  we viewed it at an angle and then it proceeded northwest towards anaheim california and was lost in the clouds after approx. 2 minutes of viewing time.  the size was amazing.  we were in shock and at least 8-10 others witnessed the same event including the parking lot security truck that stopped next to us as we all gazed at the event. i recorded this on my blackberry cell phone.  the craft lights are slightly visible in the beginning 4 seconds of the video right above the last lighted sign/pillar in the parking lot(parking lot lights wash out much of the frame/maybe someone can enhance this better). you will see the craft right above it in the 12 o'clock position.
content.summary: Large spinning ufo with lights 360 degrees around

content.detailedDescription: Forgive me for being short, im on my android. i went out to check the mail when i got home. as i started to go down the drive way, notice some orange to red dots pretty low, qt first i thought they were just helicopters. as i watched for a moment, i then thought maybe they were some type off fireworks, at that moment they started to turn at a certain point. it wasnt all at once, so it couldnt be the wind. at that point i called my mother to tell her to come out right now! shes not the type to curse regularly but when she saw what i seen she said "what the #$%& is that!" the whole ordeal only lasted about 5mins. unfortunatly i was not able to get a pic or video as i only had my phone and the street light was too bright to get anything else.
content.summary: 11 ufos in winfield mo

content.detailedDescription:
Last year, on july 3rd 2010, after fireworks over union lake in west bloomfield township, i witnessed a number of orange lights that moved fairly slowly from sw to ne across the nw quadrant of the sky, approximately 12 to 18 lights total.  i made a mufon report about this a few days later, and it is in the archive.

the exact same thing tonight, july 16, 2011 - i put the dog out at about 10:45, and went outside to turn off the sprinkler.  returning in, i had a clear view of the western sky -- same exact kind of light, orange, non-blinking, moving a bit more rapidly than last year, and appearing a bit brighter.  no sound of any kind.  here were about 8-10 over a period of 15 minutes, all originating at the exact same place on the horizon, about the "8 o'clock" position, and traversing the sky until disappearing in the north-northwestern sky.

i was viewing this event from near the eastern shore of union lake in west bloomfield township, michigan.  the nearest major cross streets are cooley lake road and hospital road or cooley lake road and hiller road.

weird.  the color is the oddest thing, i've never seen any aircraft with lights such an orange color. 

of course, after watching them for a period, i decided to go get my camera.  by the time i came back out with camera, memory card, and ready to go, they were gone, no more appeared.
content.summary: Bright orange lights moving fairly rapidly from sw to ne with no sound.

content.detailedDescription: Walked outside about dusk, headed across the yard to the swimming pool with family. 2 adults, 2 kids witnessed the sighting. we saw 3 bright orange forms in distance, close to ground above horizon.  chevron shaped, no balloon silhouette above them, seen against sundown. 3 forms were in a triangle pattern. 2 more rose above the treeline, from the south. we walked closer and could only see 1-2 above treeline. i called neighbor on phone to come witness, he did - saw 2 of them. bright orange light in chevron shape after the sky darkened too. they seemed to be floating/gliding/moving away and pretty quickly. last one finally blinked out. all headed westward from our view southwest of little rock, ar. we went swimming, pondering possibilities. nothing reported on local news websites yet. hmm...
content.summary: 5 bright lights hovering in pattern, all rise and blink out in distance

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i and daughter watched fireworks from a shopping plaza in northern new castle county - just after dropping off my mother after taking her out for ice cream on a saturday evening.  we noticed fireworks in the distance, and made a guess they were being launched from hagley museum, a notable dupont family estate and attraction.

upon greater inspection, we both noticed lights - disc shaped - bright and discernible - moving in formation - at least four of them hovering a great distance above the fireworks.  after the show, the illuminated objects stayed and moved around in the evening sky for a significant period of time.  at this point, other people exiting the restaurants in the shopping plaza began looking up and pointing to the sky.  

we discussed that they may have been "lanterns" however, they moved in a synchronized fashion - almost military - and were way above the fireworks.  in addition, while we are not aviation experts, we reside in an extremely busy airport traffic area just south of the philadelphia international airport and we have never made a call yet alone, filed a case of record.  this was something different in the night sky.

i do have a photo of the lights.
content.summary: Unknown lights that appeared to move in formation on evening of fireworks.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at 39 w. garrison street in bethlehem, pennsylvania. object was following new street and going north. it turned left to go west for two short blocks following garrison street, then turned right facing north as though remotely controlled. there was a young man yelling from a bicycle that the object was following him from the south side of bethlehem. it seemed like a cigar shaped cloud. dozens saw it. waeb radio found out about it and asked people to call in what they saw.

dictated over the phone to me, john royer f.I., by reportee.
suggest jeff in macungie be assigned to this case because reportee will talk to someone. she doesn't care who knpws her name ,etc. very open person.
jr 9 pm 7-16-2011

I am reporting this event for a gentleman whose name and e-mail i have but who wishes to remain anonymous. here is his story.

on tuesday, july 5, 2011 at 10:55 am i was traveling north/northwest on route 309 from lehigh st. and saw a craft that was the length of two c-130s. it was a thin fusiform or "cigar" shape craft flying horizontal and heading south southwest. the speed was about that of a c-130. color was white set against a clear sky. i observed it for about 1 min. until a large truck passed on my left and obscured my view for about one second and the craft was gone. the craft also had a dark central area and it appeared to be observed edge on. it also appeared to be over upper macungie and or the foglesville area.

royer note: it appears that the observer was between lehigh street and cedar crest boulevard traveling on route 309/78. i have no further information from this man. he would like to have this recorded but he definitely wants to remain anonymous. his use of comparing the object to military aircraft makes me think he may be a military man or formerly in the military. his e-mails are very precise and, from a cell phone keyboard.
I discovered what other could not see ,or have not found .
content.shape: Cigar,   Cone,   Circle,   Cylinder,   Egg,   Oval,   Sphere,   Square,   Rectagular,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Ufo on google earth " the moon " over 150 more like this !

content.detailedDescription:
On 7/11/11 at 1:16 pm eastern standard time i was driving northbound on  i-75 approx halfway between atlanta, ga. and chattanooga, tn. i observed a white cigar shaped object at an approx altitude of 2,000 ft and a quarter mile in front of my vehicle. i estimate the object to have been approx 100-150 ft long, no markings, windows, wings, vertical stabilizer or any type of trail left behind it. the object was rounded off the same on both ends, not tapered as the nose on an aircraft would be. i am a pilot and very familiar with all types of aircraft. the object travelled from as far as i could see to my right (possibly 10 miles) to as far as i could see to my left (possibly 5 miles) in 3-5 seconds. the object was travelling on a straight trajectory and was going east to west. the speed of this object well exceeded the normal operating speeds of jet aircraft that you normally see in the sky.

there was no haze in the sky so i did get a very good look at the object in the short time i had. my first thought was of u.S. ships launching cruise missiles during the gulf war. the object looked similar to the cruise missiles as they were cruising over the ground enroute to their targets.
content.summary: White cigar shaped object travelling at high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription: This is what i can remember: about 7 years old, in a neighbors basement. home owner comes down the steps, husband right behind her. "when did you come in here?" questions just kept coming. "how did you get in here?" "everyone is looking for you!" i look up at basement window. dark out. panic! i'm supposed to be home before dark! "go right home, your mother's very worried!" i never said a word to these people. i just run home as fast as i can. and i'm terrified of the dark! upon arriving home, i am confronted by my mom. she is beyond upset. starts hitting me with a yard stick. mostly i remember her words: "we've been looking for you for hours!" i was sent straight to bed. a 7 year old little girl, in complete confusion about what had just happened. i don't remember any follow up questions. the events of that evening tucked away in my memory. and life just went on. however, unexplainable experiences and sightings of ufo's continue to this day. finally needed to get this out. just telling it now makes me feel shaken inside. i've known they are real since childhood. my question now is "what are their intentions?" you don't need to contact me. proof dosen't matter anymore. that they have always been in some of our lives is a given. it isn't easy to live with though.
content.summary: They put me back in the wrong house!

content.detailedDescription:
I am writing you in response to a strange phenomenon that my fiance and i witnessed at approximately 9:40 pm on july 15th 2011.  my fiance and i were driving home from work on the evening of june 15th 2011.  at approximately 9:40 pm we noticed what appeared to be a trail of fireworks falling from the sky above i-75 north in the direction of dayton ohio.  there were three trails of falling debris that appeared to be a firework falling out of the sky or a meteor.  as we watched this for 10 seconds the fiery trails suspended in air as little burning, orange balls of light that began to dance around each other wildly.  the three lights then began to "blink" on and off and then formed a formation in a diagonal line.  we attempted to chase the lights but they were extremely fast heading in a northwest direction.  we quickly lost sight of the lights and i have never seen anything in my life like this and i recently read an article that roger marsh published online at examiner.Com from a similar incident that was witnessed by several people in the exact same location we saw the lights exactly one year ago.  the mufon case # for the incident is 24571 from what was witnessed one year ago.  this seems to be more than a coincidence and i would like to share this information with any investigator that may help explain or look further into this matter.  thank you and i hope to hear from you soon.

[name and email removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Three fiery trails followed by dancing balls of light that formed a diagonal formation.  the lights blinked on and off then quickly headed in a northwest direction.

content.detailedDescription: On my way home, back from work. i was heading west on becker rd and made a right going north on darwing blvd. on this street i noticed this oval shaped orange light. at first i didn't think it was anything other than a far away street orange light. then it blinked 2 times, that caught my attention. at that moment it started moving to my right(east) very slowly, then it stopped for about 3 seconds and started going up slowly. 15 seconds later they light was off or it disappeared. i would like to mention that the skies were very clear and we had a full moon. the light re appeared not far away from where last seen and it kept going up, when it finish going up, it started heading east. i notice it had  like an orange tail of light almost like a rocket. no blinking lights seen anywhere like any airplane or helicopter would have, but  just a big bright orange light. i got out of my vehicle and did not hear any sound at all. this light went from my 10 o'clock to my 4 o'clock. light just disappeared at that time.
content.summary: Orange light
